page.title: 19Clubs in Chelmsley Wood
page.content: About two-thirds of the people who responded to this part of questionnaire on the Chelmsley Wood area did not belong to any clubs or societies. Of those who did (62 out of 175), only 18 actualy listed their clubs with the Kingshurst Labour Club and the Mackadown Sports and social Club the most popular with 3 each. Other clubs included angling, snooker, bingo, computer, karate, cycling and supporters clubs. Asked whether they should like any new clubs or societies in the area, 63 said yes,50 no and 55 didn't know.From those who said yes, youth clubs seemed to be the most popular with 16 saying they were needed in the area,10 others mentioned the need for sports and fittness clubs and a futher 3 referred to clubs "for the whole family", and 2 others for a cinema club.
